org.apache.bookkeeper.client

Class ForceLedgerOp

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.bookkeeper.util.SafeRunnable
      • org.apache.bookkeeper.client.ForceLedgerOp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, org.apache.bookkeeper.common.util.SafeRunnable, org.apache.bookkeeper.proto.BookkeeperInternalCallbacks.ForceLedgerCallback

    class ForceLedgerOp
extends org.apache.bookkeeper.util.SafeRunnable
implements org.apache.bookkeeper.proto.BookkeeperInternalCallbacks.ForceLedgerCallback
    This represents a request to sync the ledger on every bookie.
